name: arstechnica
text:
If you love to read, you'll love the Kindle Paperwhite: https://t.co/fjxbafWLaa

It was maybe the best value in e-reading when it was updated in 2018. And Amazon has sweetened that even more for #PrimeDay in 2020: https://t.co/99hQCCXDgB https://t.co/x9b5l1Btry

name: arstechnica
text:
It didn't change much (except the much maligned keyboard), but we enjoyed the 2020 MacBook Air https://t.co/wEc7DMKy62

And on #PrimeDay, it's the rare Apple laptop you can nab for less than $1,000 (~$850): https://t.co/PjcQvyfnc3 https://t.co/5giW5nyw57
